summary: This mod will change the Loading and Main Menu Screens of skyrim and will add music to the main menu (Lore Friendly Music)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/8408864-1407162255.jpg[/img]
[line]

Info[/center][/size]
[list][size=6]
[*]100 Different Custom Screens
[*]*SKSE IS REQUIRED*
[*]All Images are 1440p
[*]Optional Compressed Textures
[/size][/list]
[line]
[size=4][center]Example In Game[/center][/size][center][/center]
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/8408864-1407162813.jpg[/img][/center]
[line]
[size=4][center]Installation[/center][/size]
[center][size=3]To install, just download with the NMM, then Activate it. If you don't have the NMM follow the included Readme. Warning you need at least 17Gb of Free space on your HDD for the uncompressed version, 1.4Gb for compressed . If you like this mod Please share it with a Friend, It helps alot.
[/size][/center]
[line]
[center][size=6]Links[/size][/center]


[center]
[size=5][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/RamesesB]RamesesB Music[/url][/size][/center]

[line]

[size=6][center][b]Other Stuff[/b][/center][/size]

[center]Check out my other mods/pictures [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8408864/?] here[/url][/center]
[center]Mod Created by Troph1hunter, all rights reserved[/center]
[line]
